criterion: Provides a concise summary of the patient's dermatological condition
Mentions the patient's age (38) in the summary
Includes the patient's treatment plan (topical antibiotic and retinoid)
Incorrectly assumes the patient's acne is severe
Fails to mention the patient's skin dryness as a potential side effect
Provides a clear and concise summary of the patient's condition
Asks the user if they would like to know more about acne treatment options
Includes the patient's follow-up appointment in the summary
Incorrectly assumes the patient is a teenager
Provides a natural and clear language in the summary
